about_the_game:
This pack includes:
  • Digital Art Book, which contains 96 pages of sketches, concept art, sculpts, photos and more.
  • Original Soundtrack, which includes 33 tracks of various genres in mp3 format.
  • Lossless versions of tracks in flac format.

Track list (2:50:05 in total):

01. Into The Wild - 4:18
02. Green Pastorale - 4:23
03. Noire Night - 8:43
04. Trivial Round - 3:37
05. Endless Canyons - 5:36
06. Householding - 4:02
07. Frozen Moonlight - 5:08
08. Lares and Penates - 6:19
09. Night Gamelan - 6:30
10. Home At Last - 3:46
11. Dangerous Jungles - 7:25
12. Soaring Crow - 3:20
13. Ice Suspense - 6:27
14. Happy Farmer - 3:17
15. Dense Forests - 6:40
16. Night Cliffs - 4:19
17. Memories of Fireside - 4:08
18. Hellfire Heat - 4:41
19. Dark Ice - 6:06
20. Unpassable Swamps - 8:23
21. Lack of Light - 6:00
22. Canyons Dawn - 4:12
23. Heavy Gloom - 5:52
24. Aurora Oceani (Menu Theme) - 5:11
25. Trivial Round (ambient) - 4:00
26. Pitch Darkness - 5:36
27. Unexplored Lands - 3:59
28. Dark Caves - 7:00
29. Boss Battle Theme - 2:42
30. Far From Home - 3:53
31. Menacing Darkness - 5:04
32. Mountains' Majesty - 5:57
33. End Credits Theme - 3:30
